name: Die Action
description:
Created for the  GMTK Game Jam 2022, theme Roll of the Dice.

A turn based 2D platformer where you roll dice to perform actions to determine how many actions you can take. Actions include moving and shooting.   Everything moves when you move so watch out!

Controls:

WASD - Move

LMB - Shoot

SPACE - Jump

E - Roll dice

Kenney Asset packs used: 

Visuals: Pixel Line Platformer, 1-Bit Pack

Sounds: Casino Sounds, Interface Sounds

Credits:

Design - Daniel Fairchild

Programming - Bruce Gdula

Music - Aran Everitt
